headline: Is Franklin Resources, Inc. (BEN) the Best Stock to Invest In for Passive Income?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Stocks to Invest in for Passive Income. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Franklin Resources, Inc. (NYSE:BEN) stands against the other stocks. Passive income is money earned with little to no ongoing effort, unlike traditional income that requires active work. Instead […]
